The European court may have gone too far with its broad ruling Tuesday - we 'll find out , as European nations implement it - but the court got one fundamental distinction right : If aggregators such as Google and Facebook are n't precisely news sources in the traditional sense , they should n't , in every instance , be treated like they are .
